data.name: AchillesVerse
data.value: Enemies deal less damage. Hazards now kill you instantly.

data.name: Acrobat
data.value: A nail hit right after dashing does increased damage and ignores armor.

data.name: BaldurShell
data.value: Grants a shield while focusing.

data.name: BindingCircle
data.value: Hitting an enemy with the dream nail can root them shortly.

data.name: BrutalStrikes
data.value: Nail arts ignore armor.

data.name: BurstingSoul
data.value: Spells deal increased damage, but each cast lowers spell damage for the rest of the room.

data.name: Caching
data.value: Excessive soul may manifest in a soul sphere. Only one sphere can be active at a time.

data.name: CalmMind
data.value: While at full health, slowing regenerates soul.

data.name: CaringShell
data.value: Hazards deal less damage.

data.name: Charge
data.value: You move and attack faster shortly after entering the room.

data.name: Cocoon
data.value: Grants 6 lifeblood.

data.name: CullTheWeak
data.value: Status effects are stronger. Doesn't apply to shattered mind.

data.name: CycloneSlash
data.value: Unlocks Cyclone Slash.

data.name: Damocles
data.value: Increases the chance of treasure room significantly. After taking damage the first time, each second could be your last...

data.name: DashSlash
data.value: Unlocks Dash Slash.

data.name: DeepBreath
data.value: Entering a new room restores a bit of soul. Gained amount decreases with missing health.

data.name: DefendersCrest
data.value: Emits a poison cloud.

data.name: Desperation
data.value: Focus speed increases with missing health.

data.name: DramaticEntrance
data.value: Entering a room deals a bit of damage to all enemies.

data.name: DreamNail
data.value: Unlocks the dream nail to gather soul from hit foes.

data.name: DreamPortal
data.value: Holding the quick map button spawns a portal. Quickly pressing same button teleports you the location. 15 seconds cooldown.

data.name: DreamShield
data.value: Spawns a rotating shield around you.

data.name: EscapeArtist
data.value: Increases your movement speed while recovering from a hit.

data.name: Fade
data.value: After standing still for 5 second you no longer take damage. Breaks on any action.

data.name: GatheringSwarm
data.value: Pulls nearby geo towards you.

data.name: GlowingWomb
data.value: Periodically spawns a hatchling that attacks enemies. Consumes Soul.

data.name: GreaterMind
data.value: Spending soul has a chance to spawn an temporary rotating orb at your location that deals damage.

data.name: GreatSlash
data.value: Unlocks Great Slash.

data.name: GroundSlam
data.value: A hardfall emits shockwaves that damage enemies hit.

data.name: GrubberflysElegy
data.value: While at full health fire waves with your nail.

data.name: HeavyBlow
data.value: Increases knockback from hitting enemies.

data.name: Initiative
data.value: The first hit on enemies deals bonus damage and grants extra soul.

data.name: Interest
data.value: Geo value is slightly increased.

data.name: LifebloodOmen
data.value: While in combat occusionally spawns a Grimm ghost temporarly. Killing it grants lifeblood.

data.name: Longnail
data.value: Increases the range of your nail.

data.name: MantisStyle
data.value: An attack after a parry does increased damage.

data.name: NailProdigy
data.value: Clearing a room without casting a spell/using focus has a small chance to spawn a combat orb.

data.name: Perfection
data.value: For each room you succeeded hitless the amount of geo enemies drop increases.

data.name: PolarityShift
data.value: Cast spells are sometimes the opposite level.

data.name: Recklessness
data.value: Great Slash and Dash Slash deal 400% increased damage, but you take damage if this doesn't kill the enemy.

data.name: Revenge
data.value: Killing an enemy that dealt damage to you recently restores a bit of health.

data.name: RoyalDecree
data.value: Killing all enemies in the marked order will award bonus geo and sometimes power orbs.

data.name: SeethingLifeblood
data.value: Clearing a room without taking damage sometimes grants lifeblood.

data.name: SharpShadow
data.value: Your shade dash is extended and deals damage.

data.name: Shatter
data.value: Consecutive hits onto the same target reduce the armor.

data.name: SoulCatcher
data.value: Slightly increases the soul gained from enemies.

data.name: SoulConserver
data.value: Focus and spells sometimes refund soul spend.

data.name: SpellProdigy
data.value: Clearing a room without the nail has a chance to grant a spirit orb.

data.name: Sporeshroom
data.value: Focus emits a spore cloud.

data.name: Sprintmaster
data.value: Increases movement speed on the ground.

data.name: StalwartShell
data.value: Increases invicibilty after being hit.

data.name: SteadyBody
data.value: Removes the nail knockback.

data.name: Sturdy
data.value: Decreases damage taken slightly.

data.name: Supreme
data.value: Killing multiple enemies in a row without taking damage restores health. Can only occur once per room.

data.name: ThornsOfAgony
data.value: Getting hit let thorns attack nearby enemies.

data.name: Vanish
data.value: Killing an enemy grants short invincibility.

data.name: Versatility
data.value: The first nail hit after casting a spell grants bonus soul.

data.name: WeakenedHusk
data.value: Enemies hit by spells are sometimes inflicted with shattered mind permanently increasing all damage taken.

data.name: Weaversong
data.value: Spawns weavers that assist you in battle.
